infos.value: We have news, Your Majesty.
We have custody of not only Lady Machérie but Queen Helena and Prince Sterne as well.
I see... So Machérie is unharmed.
What do you wish to do with the queen and prince of Leonis, Your Majesty?
I want them handed over to me.
They're bitter enemies o' Fennes, th' pair o' them.
I've always dreamed o' ending th' Leonis bloodline meself.
Same goes for any that get in my way.
I have word from Lady Machérie to welcome the queen and prince of Leonis with the greatest of hospitality, Your Majesty.
Hm...
O' course, I never considered this a one-sided trade.
I'll allow sweet Lady Machérie to return to Hourne.
Do we have a deal?
...You have left me no choice.
Then if that is settled, I shall check on Machérie.
Excuse me.
Rairyuu... What happened?
I dealt with a shinobi from Hourne.
Just what I'd expect of a master from Gouga. That's why you're worth top coin.
It seems that shinobi was sent to Robb courtesy of Machérie.
Then there's no way o' Robb knowing what Machérie and Schuzelt have been through yet?
That should be the case.
What of Oelde and his other princely runt?
It seems they fled through the rear gate of the castle with «Caelum».
Leaving behind their beloved to scurry off into th' night.
A brigade has already been dispatched in pursuit.
Just what I wanted to hear. I'll join them after.
Understood.
What's wrong?
I just got the strangest feeling that we were being watched.
It might be Muraga...
Right.
We should hurry. There's no time to waste.
